alert.note: Alert for Kidder; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:52AM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Near blizzard conditions in open country. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Kidder and Stutsman Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open country. Significant drifting may make some roads impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of whiteout conditions are likely in rural areas. Wind chills as cold as 45 below zero are expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
